ModMetaData.name: No Job Authors
ModMetaData.author: Doug, Dayrion
ModMetaData.description:
Unfinished bills are no longer tied to one pawn. Any eligible colonist can pick them up and finish them. Safe to add to existing saves. Safe to remove mid-save. If removed mid-save, existing unfinished work can still be completed by other eligible pawns. New unfinished work created after removal follows vanilla authorship behavior.
Original author: Doug Forum thread: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=47836.0
Updated and uploaded for RimWorld 1.0 on Steam by sassykoala: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1710932701
Maintained for RimWorld 1.1+ by Jellypowered (with permission from Doug): https://github.com/Jellypowered/no-job-authors/releases/latest
